mapper.insert:
SELECT id_num.currval as bno FROM dual
insert into comments (rno, bno, replyer, content) values (id_num.nextval, #{bno}, #{replyer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from comments where rno = #{rno}
